transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji good morning sir.
Executive: Ji good morning sir kaise hain?
Customer: Badhiya kaun bol rahe ho?
Executive: Siddhant bol raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji Siddhant ji boliye.
Executive: To mai keh raha hu sir yaha mai jaise abhi check kar raha tha to wo mail id aapki login ho gayi aapko Kuldeep ka call bhi aaya hoga.
Customer: Do hi hui thi sir.
Executive: Hanji?
Customer: Do hui thi do baki hai abhi.
Executive: To process to dono ka same hai na jaise aapne baki do ka kiya waise aap baki kar do do.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jaise baki do add hui hai aapki baki do login kari hai aapne?
Customer: Nahi unhone mujhe kaha tha ki wo email karo hum log karwa denge bole aapko Somwar ko call karunga mai wapas aapko karwa dunga.
Executive: Achcha wo do pata nahi chal raha tha kaun si do hui hui hai kaun si kya hai unko aapko pata hai.
Customer: Achcha us din us din us din jab mai video call pe login karwa raha tha uske baad call aaya tha na usne bola fir baki ki do mai Somwar ko karwata hu kal kul koi call aaya nahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap hi the ya koi aur tha?
Executive: Nahi mai nahi sir Kuldeep hi bol raha tha Saturday ki baat hai shayad Saturday ki ya Friday ki.
Customer: Han han ji han wo technical team se hota hai aap mujhe ye bataiye.
Customer: Lekin Siddhant bhai yaar ye leads to chhoti chhoti leads aa rahi hai mai kaise deal karunga inme yaar mere ko maximizer plan ye deke de gaya tha ki sir aapko badi badi leads aayegi aur aayengi ye 1000 500 1500 feet tak ki leads aa rahi hai tab yahi bolte ki bhaiya itni door maal lene kaise aaunga mai mera jitna maal hai usse jyada kiraya lag jayega sir jhoot kyu bola yaar mere ko.
Customer: Dekhiye to ye ho rahi hai bole maximizer me aapko badi badi leads aayegi badi badi leads aayegi usne Aryan Kumar ne aur aapke manager ne jo main head hota hai na aapka.
Customer: Jhoot bola yaar.
Executive: Dekhiye us din aapki Roshan sir Leads wohi wohi aa rahi hai pure din chalao to wohi leads aur koi wo jhooti leads aati hai wo mandir wali phone chalate rehte hai aur usko click karte hai leads sold ho jati hai samajh me nahi aata ko wo ka wohi plan ho raha hai wo 32 33000 wala tha aur ye bhi same to same hi hai koi fayda nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Paisa lene ke baad me matlab haav bhav bhi change ho jate hai.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai sir.
Customer: Bilkul sahi hai mai isko use hi nahi kar paunga sir.
Executive: Aapko dikha rahe hai.
Customer: Wo Aryan to phone bhi nahi uthata aur wo tumhara kya sir hai kya hai bole leads tumhe badi badi aayegi temples ki badi lead aayegi marble ki lead aayegi ye 1000 1500 2000 feet kaun lene aayega sir mere se.
Executive: Bilkul sahi hai mai wahi keh raha hu itni door kaun lene aayega sir wohi mere ko ye joda gaya tha mai mere kasam khuda ki tum kaho jiski kasam kha jata hu mai.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Mere baap ki kasam kha jata hu mere ko joda isliye gaya ki leads badi badi aayegi sir aap maximizer me jao.
Executive: Aap aisi baat mat kara kariye aapko mai jaldi me call karta hu aapki baat.
Customer: Sir mai genuine banda hu mai itna bada 100 100 labour ko meri ko sambhal raha hu.
Executive: Aapki baato se aapki baato se mujhe lag raha hai aap genuine bande hai aisa nahi mai nahi aapko keh raha ki aap jhoot bol rahe hai.
Customer: Mai ex minister ka ladka hu sir hamari jaan pehchan hai Makrana me ex minister ka ladka bol raha hu Abdul Aziz sahab ka.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ab kitna jyada kya batau sir aapko.
Executive: Achcha nahi baat wo nahi hai dekhiye seedhi si baat hai jis bande ko business chahiye wo.
Customer: Bole aap maximizer me jao aap maximizer me jao pareshan kar karke maximizer me kar diya aur leads to wo ki wohi aa rahi hai same to same.
Customer: Aur temple ki koi bhi leads aati hai na sir phone chalate raho to bhi wo leads deal done ho jati hai kya chakkar hai koi fayda hi nahi.
Executive: Aap aap mujhe mera to itna paisa me kuch nahi bigadega lekin aap dobara mere se koi customer jod nahi paoge kya.
Executive: Han bilkul.
Customer: Mai hum to ye kaam karte hai do minute le raha hu sir aapka jyada bol raha hu mai do minute le raha hu agar mai kisi ka achcha kaam karunga koi mere paas 500 feet 1000 feet lene aaye mai usko achcha maal dunga tabhi to mere do customer banenge.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Agar mai kapda kitna bhi achcha le lu wo darji silne wala achcha nahi hai to kaun silwayega usse bar bar.
Customer: Ab mere sath wohi ho raha hai sir ye chhoti chhoti leads aa rahi hai baat karke koi fayda nahi kasam se mai rozana koshish karta hu mai 1500 wale ko convince karne ki koshish karta hu aur hazar wale ko bhi convince karne ki koshish karta hu lekin jahir si baat hai sir wo bhi dhan khate hai koi ullu to hai nahi ki itni door marble lene aa jayenge wo.
Executive: Sir aap kaisi baat nahi karte mai aap se keh raha hu mujhe ek minute aap.
Customer: Sir jo jo hai wohi to bata raha hu mai sir aap abhi Noida baithe ho aap 500 feet maal lene aa jaoge mere paas me chalo hazar feet lene aa jaoge kya usse jyada to kiraya lag raha hai na sir.
Customer: Royalty lag rahi hai GST lag rahi hai han.
Customer: Aap aa jaoge na ye jitna paisa aap Makrana aane me kharch karoge usse jyada wo paisa wahi laga ke aap standard marble le loge na.
Customer: Han wohi Noida se.
Executive: Dekhiye aap bilkul sahi keh rahe hai aap mujhe ek minute bolne dijiye mai kya keh raha hu wo suno aap.
Executive: Mai keh raha hu us din jab Roshan sir se baat hui thi aapki to Roshan sir ne aapko kya bola tha?
Customer: Sir aapki team ka sab kuch sahi hai wo mujhe jo joda hai na Aryan ne.
Executive: Mai ye nahi keh raha sir ye mai ye nahi keh raha aap ek kaam kariye aapko maine aap to chalo kaam karne wale bande ho aapko to jo bola gaya wahi bolne wale.
Executive: Nahi aisa nahi hai mai aisa kaise ki jo bola gaya mai wohi bol dunga aapko dikhana bhi to hai.
Customer: Mai keh raha hu leads to wohi wohi aa rahi hai aap chahe wo id login kara do ya wo sab login kara do ye char id bana di wo login kara jab leads hi wohi aa rahi hai to mai kya fayda kar lunga wo.
Executive: Sir leads koi 5000 feet ki lead aaye 6000 feet ki leads aaye tab to banda koi idhar aayega na ki chalo udhar se mera 10 rupaye fayda idhar ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir id login karane se koi lena dena nahi hai sahi uska total jo lena dena hai wo aapke confirmation se aur aapke catalog se lena dena hai aapko Roshan sir ne bola tha ki aapko minimum order quantity mention karni hai aur mai abhi aapne jab bola na ki maine abhi turant check kiya kisi ne bhi aapne nahi dala.
Executive: Kisi ne bhi nahi dala.
Customer: Mai aapko dikha sakta hu maine aapko link bheja aap join karo mai abhi turant update karta hu.
Executive: Are wo bhi kar lunga mai fir bhi ho jaye to mere ko mera naam.
Executive: Mai aapko sir kai baar bol chuka hu please.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Mai aapko kai baar bol chuka hu jab bhi baat hoti hai mai har baar aapko bolta hu aur aap us din hi to bataya sir.
Executive: Kya bataya?
Executive: Us din hi to bataya ab jo cubic feet hai jo square feet hai uska square feet to utna hi likhna padega na mere ko marble ka.
Executive: Nahi mai wo nahi keh raha hu.
Executive: Ab ab wo link join karo mai dikhata hu aapko.
Customer: Chalo aap abhi mujhe thodi der me call karna mai fresh fresh ho jau.
Executive: Kitni der me karu bataiye?
Customer: Thik hai sir aap ek ghante baad me call karo sir.
Executive: Thik hai mai aapko 12 baje karu?
Executive: Abhi kya han 12 baje karo aap aaram se 12 12:30 baje ke lagbhag karo.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai mai 12 baje karta hu aapko.
Customer: Thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are small; maximizer plan not delivering promised results.

- Feels misled about the quality of leads.

- Temple leads are automatically marked as sold.

- Dissatisfied with customer service after payment.

- Expresses frustration with the current situation.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive stated that the issue is with catalog.

- Executive asked customer to join link to update catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, maximizer plan, catalog, refund, customer service
